mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardType, boardTitle, boardContents, memberId, fileAttached) values(#{boardWriter}, #{boardType}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{memberId}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by id desc
select * from board_table order by id DESC limit 1;
mapper.update: update board_table set boardView = boardView + 1 where id=#{id}
update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents}, boardType=#{boardType} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by id desc limit #{startPage}, #{maxPage}
